title: Genetic Pong
summary: It's the classic pong game, except the AI gets better over time, using something called a Genetic Algorithm. Train the AI and see if you can beat it!
long_summary: It's the classic pong game, except the AI gets better over time. It uses a Genetic Algorithm to learn different movement patterns, making it better and better as time goes on. Train the AI and see if you can beat it!

gallery.caption: At first, the genetic AI does pretty poorly, but it gets better!
Train the AI against yourself or other Pong-specific AI
